message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take this offer and we both walk away with something good!
Let's split it evenly Alice, no need to drag this out.
Okay, Bob, a little closer to even. Time is running out, let's make a deal!
This seems fair considering the inflation. Let's settle this now Alice.
Bob, my offer is still the best you'll get. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more!
Alice, I'm sticking to my previous offer.  It's a good deal for both of us given the inflation.  Let's be sensible and end this.
